nodes.text: The Barabesh system was a star system in the galaxy. The space station Colossus hid from the First Order in the system, but its location was discovered when Kazuda Xiono and Jarek Yeager attempted to rescue Tam Ryvora from the First Order. The First Order sent a Star Destroyer to attack the Colossus, but the Star Destroyer was ultimately destroyed, and the station was saved.
